content: As previously mentioned, Jinchi shares a lot of moves with the Wandering Wight. He can perform one or several spinning attacks that can be hard to judge the range of their attack, and can combo them into other moves like one or two stomp attacks, or a frighteningly fast jumping stomp attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Jinchi.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Jinchi', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Jinchi Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
As previously mentioned, Jinchi shares a lot of moves with the Wandering Wight. He can perform one or several spinning attacks that can be hard to judge the range of their attack, and can combo them into other moves like one or two stomp attacks, or a frighteningly fast jumping stomp attack.
